title: Environmental site assessments (Phase I, Phase II)
dataVerified: Property owner, environmental consultant, site address, contamination findings
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Assessment status (completed/verified). Link to environmental consultant system (owner and lenders, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fabricated clean site reports. Domain binding verifies environmental consultant. High liability risk. Long retention for CERCLA/Superfund protection. Multi-page: ESA reports are multi-page - each page can have verify line. Prevents page substitution attacks (hiding contamination findings).
